name: react-freezer-js
description: Mandatory context-based helpers for freezer-js and react.

scripts.build:umd: rm -rf build/umd && NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js build/umd/react-freezer.js && NODE_ENV=production COMPRESS=1 webpack src/index.js build/umd/react-freezer.min.js && echo "gzipped, the umd build is `gzip -c build/umd/react-freezer.min.js | wc -c` bytes"
scripts.build:npm: rm -rf build/npm && babel -d build/npm/lib ./src && cp README.md build/npm && find -X build/npm/lib -type d -name __tests__ | xargs rm -rf && node -p 'p=require("./package-npm");JSON.stringify(p,null,2)' > build/npm/package.json
scripts.test:cover: babel-node node_modules/isparta/bin/isparta cover --excludes '**/__tests__/**' --report text --report html tape -- src/**/*.test.js

author: AurÃ©lien Scoubeau
